name: FigureEditPolicy
description:
draw2d.policy.figure.FigureEditPolicy

Called by the framework if the user edit the position of a figure with a drag drop operation. Sub class like SelectionEditPolicy or RegionEditPolicy can adjust the position of the figure or the selections handles.

functions.name: onRightMouseDown
functions.description:
Called if the user press the right mouse on the figure.
You can either override the "onContextMenu" method of the figure or install an editor policy and override this method. Booth is valid and possible.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

functions.name: attr
functions.description:
Read or set object attributes.
When no value is given, reads specified attribute from the element.
When value is given, sets the attribute to that value. Multiple attributes can be set by passing an object with name-value pairs.

functions.name: onInstall
functions.description: Called by the host if the policy has been installed.

functions.name: onUninstall
functions.description: Called by the host if the policy has been uninstalled.
